snippet.title: Endocrisis - Release Date Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
Release Date on PS4 July 28 2021

Endocrisis is a technical shoot'em up. You can absorb o block bullets and power up your ship on different stages. The main goal is to beat the six guardian bosses to open the portal to the final battle.

Your energy will decrease while shooting. Absorb the yellow enemy bullets to recover energy.
